column6: This rule looks for a Palo Alto Networks Wildfire medium severity alert.
This rule looks for a Palo Alto Networks Wildfire high or critical severity alert.
This rule looks for a Palo Alto Networks Threat Vulnerability high severity alert.
This rule looks for a Palo Alto Networks Threat Vulnerability critical severity alert.
This rule looks for a Palo Alto Networks Threat critical severity alert.
This rule looks for a Palo Alto Networks Threat high severity alert.
This rule looks for a Palo Alto Networks Threat medium severity alert.
This rule looks for Palo Alto Networks Cortex alerts.
